name: Elastic Storm
body: # Elastic Storm Elastic Storm is an extension of Apache Storm, developed at the University of Rome Tor Vergata. This extension provides mechanisms for elasticity and stateful migration. The current version includes only basic policies for the newly introduced mechanisms. **Table of content** 1. [License](#license) 2. [Team](#team) *** ## License Elastic Storm is under Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use these files except in compliance with the License. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. *** ## Team Dario Luzi (developer) Matteo Nardelli (reference) ### Collaborators Valeria Cardellini
